website_summaries.verdict: Although it does not have 4K video, it still looks crisp, and you can't beat the price.
pros: A good phantom drone for those new to flying and taking photo and video
cons: Need to use an Android or iOS device

customer_reviews.title: Warranty Nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Our drone was fun for the few times we got to use it. Easy to use and great video! Unfortunately, the drone stopped working and DJI would not cover it under the warranty. NOTE: It Is $100 per hour to diagnose and fix your drone by DJI. They do not give a parts price list or quote for diagnosing. They do not diagnose without an hourly charge . Please read the description carefully! It states the new warranty info that began last August. If you make the purchase, use a credit card that offers an extended warranty on your purchases. I am so frustrated that a $500 purchase brought such short lived joy.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from SSE Photo and Video
customer_reviews.text: SSE Photo and Video - will not stand behind their warranty or help you in anyway except to tell you that you do not have a warranty. I used this 4 times, signal was lost when the drone was less than 40' away, crashed and broke. What made it worse was the unprofessionalism by SSE Photo and Video and unwillingness to help.
customer_reviews.author: Ej1406

customer_reviews.title: A real joy to fly.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3 drone. I started with the Syma x5 and x8 learning the controls and how to fly. This thing is amazing. It flies beautifully and all the failsafe features work with no trouble. takes amazing video and pictures. I have no buyers remorse though some desire for the higher end camera. For the money invested its well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: N6WOLF

customer_reviews.title: It worked for a week and than after an update ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a week and than after an update it stopped working, don't buy this online , buy in an actual store where you have warranty
customer_reviews.author: Cachimbon

customer_reviews.title: I don't like writing bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son. I don't like writing bad reviews, but for $500, this was the most difficult drone to set up. In fact we never got it fully set up and able to use. It was never able to connect to the internet. I tried doing the updates, I took it to Best Buy and they tried to set up it, another friend who has a DJI drone tried to set it, up but no one could help. I finally had to buy another drone that was twice as expensive but worked and my son has finally been able to use it. Whatever the issue is, this needs to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sheffer

customer_reviews.title: Download for androids does not work. No video no flight control.
customer_reviews.text: Dji download for androids is totally worthless. Locks up moment image appears on the screen. Can't be used for flight. And there will be no video. Also gps won't work without it. Save hundreds of dollars and look for something else that works. Read the reviews and you will see this is far to common of a problem. Dji must not care. In all fairness I downloaded the apple version onto an IPad and it works great. Just not to portable. So if you don't have an IPhone better add the cost of buying one to the price of the drone. In that case there are better options with someone else for what all that will cost.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer 1

customer_reviews.title: Range was only 600' out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Great quad, easy to fly and all the bells and whistles that the slightly cheaper models do not come with. My only complaint is the range out of the box is approximately 600', nowhere near the rated range. This is a CE model not an FCC model so that explains some of it. I purchased an ARGTek range extender for the controller and it doubled the range to about 1,300'.
customer_reviews.author: Al T.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty battery, very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Great drone, but now the battery is defective for no reason. I would give 5 stars, but I was given a faulty battery. Can I send it back and get a new one?
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: BEST model for its price!
customer_reviews.text: I love my DJI! It was the first drone that actually gave me confidence to fly without worrying about crashing it or it running away. This drone is the best for its price and still allows you to mod it if you want. I really enjoy flying my drone.
customer_reviews.author: KevinReviewsStuff

customer_reviews.title: Entry-Level Awesome Choice
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, the best entry-level drone for those who want to eventually get more serious with their drones, but also want to get their feet wet in the world of drones without having to put out almost $1K. It's better to buy the cheaper Phantom model NOW, and get better at flying and maneuvering as soon as possible, rather than waiting until you can afford a more expensive model, and being that much less experienced. Additionally, you have to consider the hidden costs of these drones - you'll certainly want more batteries, ND filters, an adequate case/backpack, and so on, all which are easier to acquire when your drone model is less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelan Rios

customer_reviews.title: A tool used for all sorts of cool jobs. I've done Roof inspections
customer_reviews.text: I've had this drone for over six months now. and I have to personally say, it is more than just a drone. It is a tool. A tool used for all sorts of cool jobs. I've done Roof inspections. Wifi Surveying, and various other tasks to earn some side income. This DJI is one of those purchases where, even though I wanted it for the "giggles", I ended up finding expert ways to use this. From surveying, to videoing competitions. I've ended up purchasing everything necessary to protect this investment, including spare parts. The quality of DJI shows. and even longer longevity if you know how to fly safely.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Forbes

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice unit. It should come with prop guards included
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice unit. It should come with prop guards included. You definitely need to get extra props, prop guards, and an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME DRONE! I am new to the drone world
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME DRONE! I am new to the drone world. This is my 3rd drone and first "real" drone. Response is awesome and the Return to home feature is an incredible feature for nubes who may otherwise end up losing the drone! Great Job, keep up the great work DJI!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: A Great Starter Bird!
customer_reviews.text: Great video! Always an adventure of worry and blood pressure whenever it leaves your sight! Not for the squeamish or faint of heart: You have over $400 of plastic flying hundreds of feet in the air out of sight......None but the Brave can tolerate flying one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Rooskie

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete
customer_reviews.text: The DJI products are very high quality. I was disappointed in Phantom 3 after a few months. It was fun at first but the range isn't very good. I upgraded to the DJI Phantom and can go 2 miles where the Phantom 3 would go about 1500 feet. It also malfunctioned on Carmel Beach for unknown reasons and I almost couldn't get it to return to me. I realize I'm mentioning two different generations of technology but I would highly recommend newer generation over the 3.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The paperwork clearly states "factory sealed". Someone was sloppy ...
customer_reviews.text: The paperwork ( cyberMIND ) clearly states "factory sealed". Someone was sloppy or someone is not telling the truth. The phantom 3 standard was missing the gimbal lock, both the plastic molded piece but also the extra little Styrofoam piece. The motors were also missing the tags that should be on each giving (I think) warnings. 3 stars because thus far I've been able to put it through it's paces with no problems encountered. This review is for documentation that this unit HAD been out of the box and probably not factory sealed. UPDATE: The intelligent battery just died. It will not charge.The Question then becomes, was it new or used?
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome!!! One thing I found and verified with dji is the firmware upgrade everyone talks about is already updated in this unit. If it needs it will pop up in the app when you connect. Update... I just had my first flight. Absolute blast! Super easy to fly. Since it was first time up did not go over 50 feet up and 100 feet away. Worked perfectly! Update after 6 days and 10 perfect flights the firmware update finally showed up took about 15 minutes completed no issues. Two flights after firmware update no issues. Out of beginner mode now. If you need a second battery DJI is running a special 104.00 for a real OEM battery!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: This has been a nightmare. Ordered it as a ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a nightmare. Ordered it as a Christmas present, it doesn't work out of the box. Compass calibration error (google it). 3 weeks to get a replacement for a Christmas present *if* the company deems that we didn't harm it. Yes, that is *if.* It has never flown. Customer service is an absolute joke. Main Christmas gift for 13 year-old a complete, total, and utter disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Kristinmb

customer_reviews.title: ... first UAV and I have yet to have a bad flight experience
customer_reviews.text: This is my first UAV and I have yet to have a bad flight experience. I did have to update the firmware when I first received it. The update failed the first time about halfway through and I was worried it had "bricked" it but after trying a second time and letting it sit and do its thing it updated successfully. If you follow best practices and pre flight checklists you should not have any problems with this UAV. I am ordering another one as a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a capable piece of technology
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this for the price. Only issue I have had is with the range. There are aftermarket antennas that might improve range but I have had only minor improvments. If you are on the fence about wanting something with more rang I recommend you bite the bullet and fork out the extra $$. This is a great machine within about 500 feet but beyond that it gets inconsistent as far as reception goes. After owning the p3s for a month or so I decided to upgrade to the Mavic Pro. It is night and day improvement on range and video quality.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: but it is awesome. The camera stays perfectly still on the gimbal ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pro type drone. I mainly just want it for video, but it is awesome. The camera stays perfectly still on the gimbal even when the drone is choppy or moving. It basically flies itself. I am just starting out but I am very happy with my purchase so far. I heard from some reviews that customer service from DJI is not up to par, but the quality is excellent. I have not had to deal with customer service so I can't say. If so I will update.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by this. It's survived 3 crashes without a scratch. (I'm not the best of pilots) It's sturdy and takes great pictures and videos. It handles the wind very well. I've flown it in gusty 15 mile an hour winds. It gets blown a little off course but not more than a few feet. It handles the wind much better than I thought was possible. I got an extra battery for it but you really don't need it. The flight time for a new battery really is about 20 minutes. It really does come ready to fly!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary W.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of drones to choose from but this one is really great. I have purchased for my kids 2 other drones and just garbage. This one is really great and not effected by normal wind or distance. Easy to set up and use. The live camera works but it's way better with the SD card!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pomaville

customer_reviews.title: This is great drone, just needs a better camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome, entry level drone, super easy and fun to fly, excellent battery life. I have but one complaint: I wish it had a little better camera. If i were to buy again, I would definitely go with the camera upgrade. (4.0 I think) Other then the camera resolution, I have had no problems with this drone. Got about 1200 feet over a cornfield before the camera signal was questionable. The camera is the weakest signal for safety. With a lot of power lines, etc, range is between 600 and 800 feet for me anyway. Believe me that is quite a ways!
customer_reviews.author: 38955modeldude

customer_reviews.title: Overall it flies beautifully. Its been such fun as I learn the ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fast though the outer box was bit crushed in. I think this was caused by the carrier. I have about hour and half flight time in so far. You definitely need to upgrade the SD card. I switched from the 8GB to a 64GB. Also get a lot of extra blades. I also bought a few carbon fiber too. And stock up on extra batteries. 25 minutes on one battery isn't enough. Overall it flies beautifully. Its been such fun as I learn the controls. I have no complaints as of this (05/01/17)
customer_reviews.author: KWright

customer_reviews.title: If your on the fence but know that you want to buy a drone DJI is the place too start
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite piece of technology i own. I have never felt more like a kid then when i get too fly this. It truly is a tech marvel that we can get something so cool for the price. Originals bought the Phantom 3 standard but then upgraded to the Phantom 4K for photography work. Bottom Line: If your on the fence but know that you want to buy a drone DJI is the place too start. I am nothing but impressed by the quality of the phantom 3
customer_reviews.author: MichaelBaileyMedia

customer_reviews.title: Watch the instructional videos and read the instructions FIRST.
customer_reviews.text: What a blast! I am ordering more batteries today so that I can fly longer. By watching the videos and following the instructions, I had NO issues. The Drone flew perfectly the first time, took great pictures, and performed flawlessly. I am glad that I have an IPhone 6 Plus, the screens of smaller phones may be hard to see. This is the best birthday present that I have ever ordered for myself.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS C LIPINSKI

customer_reviews.title: camera and app issues.
customer_reviews.text: new this drone flies xcellent, refurbished.. no comment, how ever i'm having an issue with the only free app DJIGO, and another issue with the paid app litchi, unbelievable how ths thing goes blank when i press record.... EVERY TIME! i'm very disappointing and not sure who to blame. let me be clear i love the drone, its just why isnt the app or the camera more prepared to wrk together during flights?? ive tried EVERY way to activate my rec, be4 i take off after, still, the screen freeze, and litchi wont even open in my 7 inch asus tablet. so idk, not about to send back wait have to wait again...
customer_reviews.author: Shhawmoon

customer_reviews.title: Zero customer service. Thievery best sums it up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who has been piloting one that belongs to a friend. After his first few flights, it would not pair to the phone. I returned it in the hopes of purchasing another one. My refund was $150 less than what I paid and two emails to the company through Amazon have gone un-answered. Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good mid-tier drone but has some connection issues
customer_reviews.text: The drone is easy to fly and the pictures and video look pretty good. The signal range is not great though. After about 200 feet I start to get really spotty connection and have to bring it in closer to get it to reconnect. I think the issues are mostly with the remote not the drone itself.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McGarry

customer_reviews.title: Nice drone, very glitchy and somewhat dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Great drone and video footage for the money. The computer could use some upgrades as it is sometimes glitchy. Sometimes it begins flying in one direction without even using the controls, which caused mine to crash. However I got it repaired for free by DJI. Also, there is no emergency shutdown to turn the blades off. Once you crash, the blades will continue spinning and it is very dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: redlinepa

customer_reviews.title: Best drone for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this for the price. It definitely has some areas that could be improved which probably are with the pro and newer versions with connection issues. Other than that it works great. Video is amazing. The fact that this shoots in RAW and I am a photographer makes this even better in my opinion. I have never flown a drone before buying this and I found this very easy to fly and with the on screen help and instructions it makes it a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: zachary hill

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth the expense.
customer_reviews.text: Stop right now. Don't think any more and buy this drone. Truly an exceptional product. Easily the best deal for a drone of this quality. All that's needed is a bit of online research and a smidge of common sense. Camera quality is top notch. Ease of use is amazing. My 6 year old son flies this thing without issue. Really, the only thing that could be improved is the range, but it's probably a good thing it doesn't fly too much farther! So, I 100% recommend this drone to anyone in the market.
customer_reviews.author: ATXpilot

customer_reviews.title: Wow, it's fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Bought it for my teenager, but WOW, I want one now too. It's regulated by gov. to a height and distance of 400 feet. It's very fast. I never would have believed these things go so fast. Remember to register it online with FAA so you obey the laws. At maximum ceiling height you cannot hear it running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son saved his money forever so that he could ...
customer_reviews.text: My son saved his money forever so that he could buy this drone. He loves it and can't stop talking about it. Everything came as expected and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. it's a flying photo robot
customer_reviews.text: Love it.it's a flying photo robot.takes awesome photos and video.practically flies itself.good for pictures and video.not so much for sport.it's no slouch but no tricks.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Glitches
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package flew great for 5 20minute sessions then all of a sudden the app said I" was in a no flyzone zone and the drone was landing "then the drone flipped over and came crashing to the ground. Amazon said it was obviously a mechanical failure and I am now in the process of returning it. I will purchase it again after my refund comes through but there are obviously some glitches
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Morton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drone!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing drone. Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. The return home option is awesome. And it takes amazing pictures. We live in a very small town, and he has gotten beautiful pictures of the entire town on it. We can't go anywhere without him taking it with us. And now all of his friends and our families want one. Very awesome drone!
customer_reviews.author: Katie_TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quad!!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried as anybody would be about to spend 500 dollars on something, but those worries are gone! This thing is a little workhorse with the built in auto land/ takeoff and gps you'd have to be trying pretty hard to crash this drone. You have to make sure it is updated and calibrated but for any real rc pilots out there this is no harder than doing a normal pre-flight.
customer_reviews.author: Christian H.

customer_reviews.title: Drone is awesome, make sure and read all the manuals and ...
customer_reviews.text: Drone is awesome, make sure and read all the manuals and video tutorials provided on DJI's website, very informative. Do your firmware updates, video's showing how to do this are DJI's site as well...Maybe an 60-90 minutes of setup and you're ready to go. Don't get crazy right away, baby steps, learn the drone and proper flying techniques, make sure everything is charged up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kipp

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. It takes some time getting prepared properly but ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It takes some time getting prepared properly but the technology is insane. I've flown it a half a dozen times and no issues. The quality of the camera is amazing for the money. Very happy with this machine. Very solid and easy to fly. I highly recommend this machine if you can afford this hobby. The Phantom 3 is a huge bang for the buck. So far It performs as good or better than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: David Zins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! I debated for years spending the money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I debated for years spending the money, but it was worth it. Brought it on vacation and the whole family had a blast. Especially when I used it to send a beer down to my brother in law! (not it's intended use to be sure, but it was fun). Rock solid beautiful photos and video. Used it to take a great picture of my whole family and now everyone wants a copy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mancini

customer_reviews.title: I received my Phantom 3 in excellent condition. From studying YouTube and customer reviews I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my Phantom 3 in excellent condition. From studying YouTube and customer reviews I was able to fly it flawlessly the very 1st time. It takes excellent pictures. My recommendation to any users is to always fly in GPS mode.
customer_reviews.author: Burt

customer_reviews.title: The price of batteries is crazy.
customer_reviews.text: $499 is very good price but you will pay more after you own it. The price of battery pack is crazy. DJI want to get money from selling batteries. So this product not compatible with after market battery packs. DJI put a security key inside batteries, If their are some company break the key, DJI will recover very quickly. Range is not enough, the FPV range sometimes less than 200 ft. (depend on where you are)
customer_reviews.author: Ku Pu

customer_reviews.title: This is without a doubt the best drone for first time users
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a drone for a long time. This is without a doubt the best drone for first time users. It is super easy to setup and my first flight felt like I have flown a million times before. Controls are very intuitive and super easy to use. This drone does not shoot 4K but the "2.7K" is still stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is how to make a 9 year old ridiculously happy, dad less so. Took awhile to review videos and download new firmware. Takes off and lands with one touch. Gps holds it in one place or uses waypoints. Gimbaled camera provide steady images. Camera takes very high quality photos and video. Extra smart batteries are $100!
customer_reviews.author: An Aerospace Engineer

customer_reviews.title: instruction manual silly and tootally inadequate
customer_reviews.text: Great drone for the money but you will need a friend to get it to fly for you and show you how its works...There is no reason to allow such a product on the market without capable instructions ....IT should not be allowed..My freind was expert and he correctly set it up for me..He flies them professionally,,,Thank god he was there. He agrees they are poorly set up for the beginners, Avoid at all cost unless you have a pro near by.
customer_reviews.author: aplsails

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely more fun than you can imagine. Bought it knowing i would have to have my son help me the first time. Kept it on "BEGINNERS" level for a week and have graduated to the "DO ANYTHING" level. Bought it to help survey areas that I couldn't see from atv. Has been a real time saver and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: dirtcop

customer_reviews.title: I have never flown an aircraft as easily and steady
customer_reviews.text: DJI Phantom 3 2nd Flight. Incredible 2.7k Video! I have never flown an aircraft as easily and steady, real or R/C, fixed wing or rotorcraft! Incredible value at 500.00 ****NOTE**** Looks like a few folks are having trouble downloading the firmware. Here's how I did it in less than 5 minutes. Connected wifi to the Phantom through the controller, it said, "Firmware update required". I then connected to my home wifi and the firmware downloaded. I switched back to the Phantom wifi and went through the update process. Much faster than using cell broadband to download the update.
customer_reviews.author: G. Olson

customer_reviews.title: The video quality and picture quality is GREAT and the ease of use is what we were ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're a beginner and want an unbelievable quad copter, this is the one! The video quality and picture quality is GREAT and the ease of use is what we were looking for. I was extremely happy with this purchase and I suggest purchasing the additional battery and taking a look at the YouTube videos to ensure how to use it. Do not hesitate to purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun! I was disappointed that it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fun! I was disappointed that it did not come with a lanyard, a sturdy cellphone holder, decals for the controller and a uv filter but what you get for the price is nice. Just expect to pay a couple hundred dollars more for a case, extra battery and all the accessories by the time your done but this is true for any of the drones.
customer_reviews.author: Brey

customer_reviews.title: High quality, fantastic app, easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: Love the drone...it's my first. If I knew it was so much fun, I would have bought the professional! But now with the Phantom 4 out, maybe that's ok. This drone is even better if you mod it with the ITELITE ITE-DBS01_V.1 EXTENDER ANTENNA SYSTEM. Boosts range by 2-3x.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Foolish not to get
customer_reviews.text: Wrecked it first day. I got cocky. You must respect this very sensitive instrument and follow the advice of those who came before you. Sent it back for repair and received damage report within days and, after agreeing to repair, got it back within 10 business days...get Dji care to insure your aircraft. Drone is perfect for the novice and takes great photos and videos - I can't get enough of it! Do yourself a favor and order an extra battery - buy this!
customer_reviews.author: RFTIII

customer_reviews.title: A great drone for beginners and experienced pilots
customer_reviews.text: I think the Phantom 3 is the Best Buy in the DJI line. You get all the features you need at a much lower cost. I own a few drones and still fly this one a lot and love it.
customer_reviews.author: D and P M

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband's 60th bday gift and he just came in the house from filming his cornfield. Had it for over a year. Still works good.
customer_reviews.author: coolhandluke

customer_reviews.title: Great toys for grandpa’s
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a toy but it is a mechanical achievement! Great product and enjoyable for any age operators- I’m 65 and having a blast capturing so incredible footage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are new to drones this is a pretty great starter drone. For the price I think its a great piece of hardware. Heres the pros and cons Pro: Cheap Great flying capabilities Easy to learn Good flight time Cons: THE APP SUCKS the software is just terrible Image quality goes in and out Not easy to travel with
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great, great, great drone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic first drone. I love everything about it. Easy to fly, and the picture quality is great. Much better than expected. I would buy it again in a minute--although maybe would get the Professional instead of the Standard, for the increased range.
customer_reviews.author: AceG8tr

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding but the advanced flight modes almost never work
customer_reviews.text: Pros Outstanding quality, speed, stability, video quality Cons The advanced flight modes (follow me etc.) almost never work. The app complains that there is no signal even when i set the distance and height correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Dropped out of the sky
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this drone a couple months ago. was just flying it around my house it was fully charged. next thing I know the image goes black says it has become disconnected it falls out of the sky and busts into 1 million pieces. End of story. $500 gone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful drone, especially for beginners and advanced users alike
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute great drone for the money. So easy to use, especially for beginners. I made the mistake of buying a cheap drone first to learn on and it was the wrong choice. Cheap drones are way too hard to fly and this one makes it super easy. With things like, take off and landing on its own, and the "follow" mode, which the drone will follow the user all by itself. This is a great drone and would recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great movies and easy to fly.
customer_reviews.text: Takes great movies and is easy to fly. Anyone buying one of these higher cost drones should already have learned on a low cost one, so as not to do something foolish. Know how to fly it. I use it with Nexus 7 tablet and the fpv is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Keembo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drone for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and I learned a lot with it and I made a great shots. My only problem with this drone is that the gps signal is very weak but I am not sure if is that or if Venezuelan government put some signal inhibitor where I use my drone. I recommend it before you can buy the Mavic drone which is the one that I want to get.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Fun
customer_reviews.text: What is more fun than this thing? Such a blast to play with and learn how to fly before going more expensive. So easy to fly with the iphone app and endless fun. Great camera for the price. If I had it to do over, I would get the advanced to have a longer flight range. This one goes a couple blocks before I lose signal.
customer_reviews.author: Cor

customer_reviews.title: Superb video and easy to fly.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to fly. Long range. Very stable, quality video. I use it on our ranch for fun and recently for checking a creek was flowing well. product_meta.title: DJI Phantom 3 Standard Quadcopter Drone with 2.7K HD Video Camera
product_meta.description: Style:Quadcopter OnlyThe Phantom 3 Standard is the best way to start enjoying aerial photography, even with no prior experience. With the all-in-one ready to fly design and simple GPS- assisted flight, the Phantom 3 Standard lets you focus on taking great pictures and videos from the sky. With a range of over half a mile and crystal clear live video streaming over Wi-Fi to your mobile device on the free DJI Go app, the Phantom 3 Standard delivers sophisticated functionality with a simple learning curve and an accessible price point.
feature_bullets: Refer the user manual and videos on this page for troubleshooting.Enjoy the view: A live video feed gives you a 720p HD real-time view of what your camera sees right on your mobile device
View a live image streamed from the drone up to a half mile away on the DJI Go app using your mobile phone or tablet

GPS assisted flight features let you concentrate on getting great images while the drone helps you fly safely. You can achieve advanced camera perspectives with the Point of Interest, Follow Me and Waypoints modes (pending app feature availability)
Fly up to 25 minutes with the included intelligent battery. A range of accessories is included:1 battery and charger, full set of propellers, radio controller
Update the remote control first before use.
